## Description
The game board and UI need better mobile support for smaller screens.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Game board scales properly on mobile
- [ ] Touch-friendly button sizes
- [ ] Readable text on small screens
- [ ] Navigation works on mobile

## Technical Notes
- Update Tailwind responsive classes
- Test on various screen sizes
- Consider touch gestures
